alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Northern Warren; Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 9:56PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Hamilton, west central Warren and east central Herkimer Counties through 1030 PM EDT... At 955 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of Lewey Lake Campground to Ohio. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Speculator, Ohio, Lake Pleasant, Lewey Lake Campground, Moffitt Beach Campground, Oregon, Gilmantown, Girards Sugarbush, Nobleboro, Perkins Clearing, Clockmill Corners, Whitehouse, Shaker Place, Piseco, Wilmurt Corners, Morehouseville, Hoffmeister, Garnet Lake, Powley Place and Rudeston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Northern Warren; Southern Herkimer
